meanings.definition: characteristic of or resembling the backwoods
meanings.sent1: The small cabin in the woods had a backwoodsy feel to it.
meanings.sent2: The old barn had a backwoodsy charm that attracted visitors.
meanings.sent3: The backwoodsy decor of the restaurant made it feel like a cozy hideaway.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe choices were so backwoodsy, she could have been mistaken for a forest nymph.
meanings.sent5: The backwoodsy scent of pine trees filled the air, creating a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: unsophisticated or rustic in style or manner
meanings.sent1: The backwoodsy furniture in the cabin was simple yet sturdy.
meanings.sent2: His backwoodsy manners made him endearing to everyone he met.
meanings.sent3: She tried to impress her city friends with her backwoodsy cooking skills.
meanings.sent4: The backwoodsy setting of the farm reminded him of simpler times.
meanings.sent5: The backwoodsy music playing in the background added to the cozy ambiance of the room.
